itunes:title: Performing In Front Of 13,000 People (Pluko)
title: Performing In Front Of 13,000 People (Pluko)
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
Today's guest is Pluko, aka Sam, who is a insanely talented musician. We chat about his laptop dying in front of sold out crowd, playing in front of 13,000 people, collating with Kanye, a massive Spotify following, and more! 

Check out his instagram @pluko 

Follow us on instagram @lightweightspod Shoot us a message with some one you'd want us to have on our pod!

Thank to our sponsors Vodacast and My Bookie for sponsoring today's episode
